Package dijkstra

Class Dijkstra

java.lang.Object
dijkstra.Dijkstra
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Dijkstra
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Implements Dijkstra's algorithm and computes for every point of interest shortest path to other points of interest
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • calculateShortestPathFromSource

      public Dijkstra calculateShortestPathFromSource​(Dijkstra graph, long source_Id)
      Dijkstra algorithm. Computes shortest path to every point of interest points of interests distance are set to minimum distance to source
      Parameters:
      graph - Dijkstra with data loaded and initialized (nodes with distance set to infinity)
      source_Id - node from which we want to calculate shortest path
      Returns:
      Dijkstra instance with variables containing proper data (i.e, distances) starting from source node

    • getShortestPath

      public java.util.LinkedList<Node> getShortestPath​(Node source, Node destination)
      Finds shortest path between two nodes
      Parameters:
      source - source node
      destination - destination node
      Returns:
      list of nodes constituting the shortest path between source and destination

      public void addRequest​(long pickupId, long deliveryId, long sourceId)

    • findNodeInterest

      public Node findNodeInterest​(long id)
      Finds points of interest given an id
      Parameters:
      id - node's id
      Returns:
      point of interest as a Node or null if it doesn't exist

    • findNodeGraph

      public Node findNodeGraph​(long id)
      Finds node in graph given an id
      Parameters:
      id - node's id
      Returns:
      node or null if it is not in the graph
